body:
Comment 1: 
I thought this bug was fixed a few days ago, but you don't say what version of Go you
are using. However, since your program imports "json" I know it's not recent; the
package has moved to "encoding/json".

Nonetheless, after that edit the program fails at tip. Thanks for your report.
_Owner changed to @rsc._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._
